descriptions.title: Authorization Empowerment
descriptions.content:
Description

An authorization empowerment is a short empowerment for protector deity practice.

Example Texts

  • Srung ma’i bka’ gtad 
  • Las gshin bka’ gtad 
  • Ge sar skyes bu chen po'i bka' gtad dgra bla'i dar chen 
  • See also bka' srung bka' gtad
